trans-unit.source: Tests whether an authentication header is a bearer challenge
trans-unit.target: Tests whether an authentication header is a bearer challenge

trans-unit.source: The authentication header value to test.
trans-unit.target: The authentication header value to test.

trans-unit.source: <languageKeyword>true</languageKeyword> if the header is a bearer challenge; otherwise, <languageKeyword>false</languageKeyword>.
trans-unit.target: <languageKeyword>true</languageKeyword> if the header is a bearer challenge; otherwise, <languageKeyword>false</languageKeyword>.

trans-unit.source: This method is forgiving: if the parameter is null, or the scheme in the header is missing, then it will simply return false.
trans-unit.target: This method is forgiving: if the parameter is null, or the scheme in the header is missing, then it will simply return false.
